txt.en: Ostasänt can be found in Sûri-kylä.\n\nYou should speak with Ostasänt.
Roving Threat: Gronkerna, the Juggernaut Slave
Evil stirs in the Northern realm, including Gronkerna, who has become corrupted by the Guaredain over years of enslavement.
Gronkerna can be found somewhere in Forochel.\n\nYou should defeat Gronkerna.

'We Lossoth care for our Mammoths. They are a valuable creature for travel and protection from the Northern storms.

'The Gauredain do not hold the Mammoth in as high regard. They corrupt them, raise them with hatred.

'The largest of their Mammoths is Gronkerna. I warn you, this creature is deadly. Its rider can barely control the beast. Sadly this menace needs to be dealt with.'

'At last, Gronkerna can rest. That creature has endured a fate worse than death for far too long. No Lossoth would ever treat a Mammoth with such disregard as the Guaredain do. I hope that one day we shall put an end to the Guaredain's treachery in the North.'
